overview: Karen sees the world a little differently than most. Her days are spent satisfying an endless parade of horny guys in her little peepshow booth, until Ryan shows up on the other side of the glass. Heâ€™s a an ex-stock broker who lost everything, including his girlfriend in the recent financial meltdown. After a couple of unsuccessful attempts, the unlikely pair decide to give love a shot with hilarious results.
title: Peepshow
